  <script id="jquery-js-after" type="text/javascript">
   (function () {
            function setHeaderTopSpacing() {

                setTimeout(function() {
                  var headerTop = document.querySelector('.header-top');
                  var headers = document.querySelectorAll('.header-wrapper .header,.header-wrapper .header-homepage');

                  for (var i = 0; i < headers.length; i++) {
                      var item = headers[i];
                      item.style.paddingTop = headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px";
                  }

                    var languageSwitcher = document.querySelector('.mesmerize-language-switcher');

                    if(languageSwitcher){
                        languageSwitcher.style.top = "calc( " +  headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px + 1rem)" ;
                    }
                    
                }, 100);

             
            }

            window.addEventListener('resize', setHeaderTopSpacing);
            window.mesmerizeSetHeaderTopSpacing = setHeaderTopSpacing
            mesmerizeDomReady(setHeaderTopSpacing);
        })();
  </script>

                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     Degree
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-0-caebd45" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535e4c23c5" id="Collapse-bc2283067e535e4c23c5">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     Applicants must have a Bachelor's degree or equivalent in the area of (Computational) Linguistics, Language Technology, Cognitive Sciences, Computer Science, Mathematics, Artificial Intelligence, or other relevant disciplines, subject to the consent of and the approval by the consortium's admission committee.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-1-caebd45">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-8417e7167e535e4c23c5" aria-expanded="false" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-8417e7167e535e4c23c5" href="#collapse-8417e7167e535e4c23c5">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     My current degree is in Literature, Language and Education, or Translation. Am I eligible for the LCT Program?
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-1-caebd45" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535e4c23c5" id="Collapse-8417e7167e535e4c23c5">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     Formally, you are eligible to apply to the program with such a degree. The selection committee will carefully review your qualifications to determine whether your background in formal linguistics is sufficient to allow you to successfully participate in the program. In terms of your academic qualifications, it depends on how much formal linguistics is covered in the courses you have taken. In the past, it has often been the case that courses in literature departments, for example, did not meet the minimum linguistic requirements. There have been exceptions, but in general literature students do not take the kind of formal linguistics courses that are needed for computational linguistics. Catching up in both computer science and linguistics would be too much for the three to four semesters of courses that our students do. However, students from "hardcore" linguistics departments typically satisfy the requirements, and thus do not need to catch up on linguistics, only on computer science.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-2-caebd45">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-3dad4e067e535e4c23c5" aria-expanded="false" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-3dad4e067e535e4c23c5" href="#collapse-3dad4e067e535e4c23c5">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     BSc/BA degree is still in progress
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-2-caebd45" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535e4c23c5" id="Collapse-3dad4e067e535e4c23c5">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     If your BSc/BA degree is still in progress, you may nevertheless submit an application. Complete the section "Expected Degree" in the online application form. The restriction in this case will be that the BSc/BA certificate is available before the Master's study course begins.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-3-caebd45">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-9a35f9867e535e4c23c5" aria-expanded="false" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-9a35f9867e535e4c23c5" href="#collapse-9a35f9867e535e4c23c5">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     Language
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-3-caebd45" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535e4c23c5" id="Collapse-9a35f9867e535e4c23c5">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     Proficiency in English (for non-native speakers) must be certified by one of the following:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                     <li>
                      TOEFL score of at least 95 overall, with at least 24 points on the writing section (internet-based test).
                      <br/>
                      <i>
                       Note: Expired TOEFL scores or copies of the student score report cannot be accepted.
                      </i>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p>
                     TOEFL Best Scores are acceptable for central application and selection. In case of acceptance, an updated certificate may be required for enrollment at the local university site.
                    </p>
                    <ul class="other-ul-ol">
                     <li>
                      Cambridge Certificate in Advanced English — at least B
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Cambridge Proficiency Exam — pass.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      IELTS score of at least 7.0.
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p>
                     No other documents can be accepted as confirmation of English proficiency.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <em>
                      Please note:
                     </em>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     Applicants from countries where English is not the ONLY native language do need one of the certificates mentioned above.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     The TOEFL code number is
                     <b>
                      8497
                     </b>
                     . All LCT TOEFL scores should be sent to the Deptartment of Language Science and Technology at Saarland University. So it is
                     <b>
                      important
                     </b>
                     to enter the code
                     <b>
                      8497
                     </b>
                     on your answer sheets when you sit for the examination. Please do not upload or send us a copy of the student record of your TOEFL scores. We can only accept official scores sent to us directly from the TOEFL organization. If you have taken the TOEFL within the past 2 years and wish to order an official score report to be sent directly from the TOEFL organization, you will find instructions on
                     <a href="https://www.ets.org/toefl.html">
                      the website of TOEFL
                     </a>
                     .
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-4-caebd45">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-25b667467e535e4c23c5" aria-expanded="false" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-25b667467e535e4c23c5" href="#collapse-25b667467e535e4c23c5">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     Application platform
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-4-caebd45" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535e4c23c5" id="Collapse-25b667467e535e4c23c5">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     The application platform is available via this
                     <a href="https://application.lct-master.org/">
                      link
                     </a>
                     .
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </section>
         <section class="elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-4b6166e elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="4b6166e" data-settings='{"_ha_eqh_enable":""}'>
          <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
           <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-inner-column elementor-element elementor-element-733f86e" data-element_type="column" data-id="733f86e">
            <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
             <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3f178e0 elementor-widget elementor-widget-elementskit-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="3f178e0" data-widget_type="elementskit-heading.default">
              <div class="elementor-widget-container">
               <div class="ekit-wid-con">
                <div class="ekit-heading elementskit-section-title-wraper text_left ekit_heading_tablet- ekit_heading_mobile-">
                 <h2 class="ekit-heading--title elementskit-section-title">
                  Deadline and procedure
                 </h2>
                 <div class="ekit_heading_separetor_wraper ekit_heading_elementskit-border-divider">
                  <div class="elementskit-border-divider">
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-0f1ffc8 elementor-widget elementor-widget-elementskit-accordion" data-element_type="widget" data-id="0f1ffc8" data-widget_type="elementskit-accordion.default">
              <div class="elementor-widget-container">
               <div class="ekit-wid-con">
                <div class="elementskit-accordion accoedion-primary" id="accordion-67e535e4c4229">
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-0-0f1ffc8">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-bc2283067e535e4c4229" aria-expanded="true" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-bc2283067e535e4c4229" href="#collapse-bc2283067e535e4c4229">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     Eligibility criteria
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-0-0f1ffc8" class="show collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535e4c4229" id="Collapse-bc2283067e535e4c4229">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     A joint committee which consists of representatives from each partner institution selects the students. Based on their performance and excellence in prior coursework, students are chosen to study in the program.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     All applications are first screened for fulfilling the following
                     <b>
                      eligibility criteria
                     </b>
                     :
                    </p>
                    <ol class="other-ul-ol">
                     <li>
                      Meeting the application deadline
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Completeness of the application
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      English language proficiency
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Bachelor's degree (at least projected completion before starting the LCT Program) or equivalent in the area of (Computational) Linguistics, Language Technology, Cognitive Sciences, Computer Science, Mathematics, Artificial Intelligence, or other relevant disciplines, subject to the consent of and the approval by the consortium's admission committee.
                     </li>
                    </ol>
                    <p>
                     All applications that meet the eligibility criteria are then assessed according to the following
                     <b>
                      selection criteria
                     </b>
                     :
                    </p>
                    <ol class="other-ul-ol">
                     <li>
                      Results in undergraduate education: grade and quality of first degree (which mark did the students receive and and from which university or program did they graduate?); time spent to receive first degree and way of conducting studies (short and focused, or if long additional activities, richness of studies depending on field, additional activities besides studies); having worked or studied in an interdisciplinary environment (type of first degree studies or additional experience outside the first degree studies);
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Results in areas relevant for LCT, namely Computer Science and a proven interest in Language Technology (including strong background in formal linguistics);
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Result of TOEFL, IELTS or other acceptable test; language abilities and practical application in studying or working;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Benefit potential for the students, how the student may profit from participating in the LCT program;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Motivation of the student for wanting to participate in the LCT program (expectations, own contribution).
                     </li>
                    </ol>
                    <p>
                     All criteria are equally weighted, except for the English proficiency criterion, which is applied in case of otherwise equal ranking.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-e01e255 elementor-widget elementor-widget-elementskit-accordion" data-element_type="widget" data-id="e01e255" data-widget_type="elementskit-accordion.default">
              <div class="elementor-widget-container">
               <div class="ekit-wid-con">
                <div class="elementskit-accordion accoedion-primary" id="accordion-67e535e4c4ace">
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-0-e01e255">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-bc2283067e535e4c4ace" aria-expanded="true" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-bc2283067e535e4c4ace" href="#collapse-bc2283067e535e4c4ace">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     Application deadline
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-0-e01e255" class="show collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535e4c4ace" id="Collapse-bc2283067e535e4c4ace">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     Application deadline was February 28, 2025.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-1-e01e255">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-d3b0a8e67e535e4c4ace" aria-expanded="false" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-d3b0a8e67e535e4c4ace" href="#collapse-d3b0a8e67e535e4c4ace">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     Application assessment and selection schedule
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-1-e01e255" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535e4c4ace" id="Collapse-d3b0a8e67e535e4c4ace">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     Erasmus Mundus scholarships will not be available for the intake 2025. Selection will begin after the application deadline. Notification of acceptance to the program on a self-funded basis is planned for early April 2025.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-2-e01e255">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-10a155367e535e4c4ace" aria-expanded="false" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-10a155367e535e4c4ace" href="#collapse-10a155367e535e4c4ace">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     Application procedure
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-2-e01e255" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535e4c4ace" id="Collapse-10a155367e535e4c4ace">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     <b>
                      European
                     </b>
                     applicants are defined as nationals of an EU member state, an EEA-EFTA state (Iceland, Norway and Liechtenstein) or other nationals who have carried out their main activity (studies, work, etc.) for more than a total of 12 months over the last five years in one of these countries.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <b>
                      Non-European
                     </b>
                     applicants are all others. Nationals from EU candidate countries may be considered as Europeans applicants.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     NB: Special note for applicants from the Western Balkans region (i.e. Albania, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Kosovo under UNSC resolution 1244/99, Montenegro): unless otherwise determined, due to residency abroad, your application should be submitted under the category "non-European".
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     NB: If you are selected for a scholarship, placed on the reserve list or enrolled on a self-financing basis, your data may be used for purposes of evaluating the Erasmus Mundus Programme and will be made available to the EACEA, the Erasmus Mundus National Structures, the EU Delegations and the Erasmus Mundus Student and Alumni Association.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     The procedure to submit a complete application is as follows:
                    </p>
                    <ol class="other-ul-ol">
                     <li>
                      Fill out the application form.
                      <ul>
                       <li>
                        Provide the names of 2 referees of your choice on the application form. Using the email address you provide, your referees will be contacted and asked to upload letters of recommendation.
                        <b>
                         Be sure to complete this step to allow your referees adequate time to complete the letters and upload them before the application deadline.
                        </b>
                        <p>
                         Alternatively, your referee may send their letter by post to our contact address, but it must come directly from the
                         <b>
                          referee
                         </b>
                         (not from you), be securely sealed, and sent by the deadline.
                        </p>
                       </li>
                       <li>
                        OPTIONAL: You may provide your preferences for the host and partner universities together with the reasons for your choice. While your preferences will be taken into account, the final assignment will be made to best fit your study needs. The University of Malta and the University of Trento are not available for the intake 2025.
                       </li>
                      </ul>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Upload the following documents via the file upload interface:
                      <ul>
                       <li>
                        a current Curriculum Vitae (CV), written in English (upload into the field
                        <b>
                         Curriculum Vitae (CV)
                        </b>
                        )
                       </li>
                       <li>
                        certified copies of:
                        <ul>
                         <li>
                          your Bachelor's degree, if already completed (upload into the field
                          <b>
                           Degree Certificate
                          </b>
                          )
                         </li>
                         <li>
                          certificates attesting to the fulfillment of the language requirements (upload into the field
                          <b>
                           English Certification
                          </b>
                          )
                         </li>
                        </ul>
                       </li>
                       <li>
                        a transcript of academic records (upload into the field
                        <b>
                         Transcript of Records
                        </b>
                        )
                       </li>
                       <li>
                        a copy of your identity document (upload into the field
                        <b>
                         Passport
                        </b>
                        )
                       </li>
                      </ul>
                     </li>
                    </ol>
                    <p>
                     If your original documents are in a language other than English, please also submit certified translations.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <strong>
                      Please note that we cannot return any documents that you send us.
                     </strong>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     In case of multiple online applications, only the most recent will be considered. If you submit more than one online application, you must re-upload all required documents into the most recent application.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <strong>
                      Special note for students from China, India and Vietnam who are allocated or applying to Saarland University:
                     </strong>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     You may be required to have your documents validated via the APS procedure. Some exemptions are possible. For more information, you can start on the
                     <a href="https://www.uni-assist.de/en/tools/glossary-of-terms/description/term/akademische-pruefstelle-aps/">
                      Uni Assist page
                     </a>
                     , below, and consult country-specific information.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </section>
         <section class="elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-7faed6f elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="7faed6f" data-settings='{"_ha_eqh_enable":""}'>
          <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
           <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-inner-column elementor-element elementor-element-749037b" data-element_type="column" data-id="749037b">
            <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
             <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-2790bc5 elementor-widget elementor-widget-elementskit-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="2790bc5" data-widget_type="elementskit-heading.default">
              <div class="elementor-widget-container">
               <div class="ekit-wid-con">
                <div class="ekit-heading elementskit-section-title-wraper text_left ekit_heading_tablet- ekit_heading_mobile-">
                 <h2 class="ekit-heading--title elementskit-section-title">
                  Appeal Procedure
                 </h2>
                 <div class="ekit_heading_separetor_wraper ekit_heading_elementskit-border-divider">
                  <div class="elementskit-border-divider">
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-1d04bc9 elementor-widget elementor-widget-elementskit-accordion" data-element_type="widget" data-id="1d04bc9" data-widget_type="elementskit-accordion.default">
              <div class="elementor-widget-container">
               <div class="ekit-wid-con">
                <div class="elementskit-accordion accoedion-primary" id="accordion-67e535e4c64ed">
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-0-1d04bc9">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-bc2283067e535e4c64ed" aria-expanded="true" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-bc2283067e535e4c64ed" href="#collapse-bc2283067e535e4c64ed">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     Appeal procedure
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-0-1d04bc9" class="show collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535e4c64ed" id="Collapse-bc2283067e535e4c64ed">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     If a candidate has not been selected and has grounds to believe that their application file,
                     <strong>
                      although complete
                     </strong>
                     , has not been processed through the selection procedure, they may engage an appeal procedure.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     Before submitting an appeal, please check carefully whether
                    </p>
                    <ul class="other-ul-ol">
                     <li>
                      you observed the application deadline
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      you followed the application procedure
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      you submitted the documents required for a complete application
                      <br/>
                      <br/>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p>
                     If the above conditions are met and you have reasons to believe that a mistake has been made during the selection procedure, you may submit an appeal. An appeal request must be made as follows:
                    </p>
                    <ul class="other-ul-ol">
                     <li>
                      by a letter to the LCT Coordinator
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      clearly stating the reasons for the appeal
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      sent within 7 working days after receiving the notification of non-selection
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      sent by email to lct-info(at)lst(dot)uni-saarland(dot)de
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      the subject line of the appeal request email must contain the text "LCT non-selection appeal" and the last name of the candidate
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     Note:
                     <br/>
                     A candidate may appeal
                     <strong>
                      ONLY
                     </strong>
                     on the grounds of defective or unfair procedure. The appeal procedure is concerned with how the application was handled in the evaluation and eligibility-checking process. It does not automatically lead to re-evaluation. Please note that new information or clarifications that should have been in the application will not be taken into consideration.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </section>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>

  <script id="jquery-js-after" type="text/javascript">
   (function () {
            function setHeaderTopSpacing() {

                setTimeout(function() {
                  var headerTop = document.querySelector('.header-top');
                  var headers = document.querySelectorAll('.header-wrapper .header,.header-wrapper .header-homepage');

                  for (var i = 0; i < headers.length; i++) {
                      var item = headers[i];
                      item.style.paddingTop = headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px";
                  }

                    var languageSwitcher = document.querySelector('.mesmerize-language-switcher');

                    if(languageSwitcher){
                        languageSwitcher.style.top = "calc( " +  headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px + 1rem)" ;
                    }
                    
                }, 100);

             
            }

            window.addEventListener('resize', setHeaderTopSpacing);
            window.mesmerizeSetHeaderTopSpacing = setHeaderTopSpacing
            mesmerizeDomReady(setHeaderTopSpacing);
        })();
  </script>

              <div class="elementor-widget-container">

                <div class="ekit-heading elementskit-section-title-wraper text_left ekit_heading_tablet- ekit_heading_mobile-">
                 <h2 class="ekit-heading--title elementskit-section-title">
                  Call for application 2025 (closed)
                 </h2>
                 <div class="ekit_heading_separetor_wraper ekit_heading_elementskit-border-divider">
                  <div class="elementskit-border-divider">
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>

             <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-caebd45 elementor-widget elementor-widget-elementskit-accordion" data-element_type="widget" data-id="caebd45" data-widget_type="elementskit-accordion.default">
              <div class="elementor-widget-container">
               <div class="ekit-wid-con">
                <div class="elementskit-accordion accoedion-primary" id="accordion-67e535ecb0061">
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-0-caebd45">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-bc2283067e535ecb0061" aria-expanded="true" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-bc2283067e535ecb0061" href="#collapse-bc2283067e535ecb0061">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     European Masters Program in Language and Communication Technologies (LCT)
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-0-caebd45" class="show collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535ecb0061" id="Collapse-bc2283067e535ecb0061">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     The European Masters Program in Language and Communication Technologies (LCT) invites applicants from both European and non-European countries for the start in fall 2025.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     Key facts:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                     <li>
                      duration of 2 years (120 ECTS );
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      double degree;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      study one year each at two different partner universities in Europe;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      in-depth instruction in computational linguistics methods and technologies;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      three specialization tracks;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Erasmus Mundus scholarships are not available this year.
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-1-caebd45">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-83dcdc067e535ecb0061" aria-expanded="false" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-83dcdc067e535ecb0061" href="#collapse-83dcdc067e535ecb0061">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     Eligibility criteria and admission requirements
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-1-caebd45" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535ecb0061" id="Collapse-83dcdc067e535ecb0061">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     Applicants must have a
                     <b>
                      Bachelor's degree or equivalent
                     </b>
                     in the area of (Computational) Linguistics, Language Technology, Cognitive Sciences, Computer Science, Mathematics, Artificial Intelligence, or other relevant disciplines, subject to the consent of and the approval by the consortium's admission committee.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <b>
                      English language proficiency
                     </b>
                     must be certified by one of the following tests: TOEFL, Cambridge Certificate in Advanced English, Cambridge Proficiency Exam, IELTS.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     For
                     <b>
                      detailed information
                     </b>
                     regarding eligibility criteria and admission requirements please see
                     <a href="/application1/">
                      here
                     </a>
                     .
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-2-caebd45">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-cdcd4b267e535ecb0061" aria-expanded="false" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-cdcd4b267e535ecb0061" href="#collapse-cdcd4b267e535ecb0061">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>

                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">

                    </span>

                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-2-caebd45" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535ecb0061" id="Collapse-cdcd4b267e535ecb0061">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     <b>
                      Complete the application form:
                     </b>
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                     <li>
                      Fill in your personal details, information about your previous education and write a statement of interest;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Provide contact details of two referees who will write and upload letters of recommendation for you.
                      <br/>
                      <br/>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p>
                     <b>
                      Upload the following documents to the application platform:
                     </b>
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                     <li>
                      a current Curriculum Vitae (CV), written in English;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      certified copy of your Bachelor's degree certificate (if already completed) and other degree certificates (if you posses any);
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      certificates attesting the fulfillment of the language requirements;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      a transcript of academic records;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      a copy of your identity document.
                      <br/>
                      <br/>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p>
                     <strong>
                      Application form
                     </strong>
                     is available
                     <a href="https://application.lct-master.org/">
                      here
                     </a>
                     .
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <b>
                      Application deadline: 28.02.2025
                     </b>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <b>
                      Selection
                     </b>
                     will begin after the application deadline has ended.
                     <b>
                      Notification of acceptance
                     </b>
                     to the program on a self-funded basis is planned for early April 2025.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     For
                     <b>
                      detailed information
                     </b>
                     regarding the application process please see
                     <a href="/application1/">
                      here
                     </a>
                     .
                    </p>

                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     Erasmus Mundus scholarships are
                     <b>
                      not available
                     </b>
                     for the intake 2025. Students can participate on a self-funding basis. A limited number of partial fee waivers will be available.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     The following program fees apply:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                     <li>
                      € 8,500 per year for
                      <b>
                       non-European
                      </b>
                      students;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      € 4,250 per year for
                      <b>
                       European students
                      </b>
                      .
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p>
                     See more information on the page
                     <a href="/financial_information/">
                      Financial Information
                     </a>
                     .
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>

   (function () {
            function setHeaderTopSpacing() {

                setTimeout(function() {
                  var headerTop = document.querySelector('.header-top');
                  var headers = document.querySelectorAll('.header-wrapper .header,.header-wrapper .header-homepage');

                  for (var i = 0; i < headers.length; i++) {
                      var item = headers[i];
                      item.style.paddingTop = headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px";
                  }

                    var languageSwitcher = document.querySelector('.mesmerize-language-switcher');

                    if(languageSwitcher){
                        languageSwitcher.style.top = "calc( " +  headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px + 1rem)" ;
                    }
                    
                }, 100);

             
            }

            window.addEventListener('resize', setHeaderTopSpacing);
            window.mesmerizeSetHeaderTopSpacing = setHeaderTopSpacing
            mesmerizeDomReady(setHeaderTopSpacing);
        })();
  </script>

   <div class="elementor elementor-3801" data-elementor-id="3801" data-elementor-settings="[]" data-elementor-type="wp-page">
    <div class="elementor-section-wrap">
     <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-556bf9c9 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="556bf9c9" data-settings='{"_ha_eqh_enable":""}'>
      <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
       <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-35deae03" data-element_type="column" data-id="35deae03">
        <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
         <section class="elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-421f040 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="421f040" data-settings='{"_ha_eqh_enable":""}'>
          <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
           <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-inner-column elementor-element elementor-element-b3edd18" data-element_type="column" data-id="b3edd18">
            <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
             <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3e8f791 elementor-widget elementor-widget-elementskit-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="3e8f791" data-widget_type="elementskit-heading.default">
              <div class="elementor-widget-container">
               <div class="ekit-wid-con">
                <div class="ekit-heading elementskit-section-title-wraper text_left ekit_heading_tablet- ekit_heading_mobile-">
                 <h2 class="ekit-heading--title elementskit-section-title">
                  Financial Information
                 </h2>
                 <div class="ekit_heading_separetor_wraper ekit_heading_elementskit-border-divider">
                  <div class="elementskit-border-divider">
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-caebd45 elementor-widget elementor-widget-elementskit-accordion" data-element_type="widget" data-id="caebd45" data-widget_type="elementskit-accordion.default">
              <div class="elementor-widget-container">
               <div class="ekit-wid-con">
                <div class="elementskit-accordion accoedion-primary" id="accordion-67e535f1d9ab4">
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-0-caebd45">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-bc2283067e535f1d9ab4" aria-expanded="true" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-bc2283067e535f1d9ab4" href="#collapse-bc2283067e535f1d9ab4">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     LCT Program Fees
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-0-caebd45" class="show collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535f1d9ab4" id="Collapse-bc2283067e535f1d9ab4">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     For
                     <b>
                      non-European
                     </b>
                     students, the program fees are € 8,500 per year.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     For
                     <b>
                      European
                     </b>
                     students,the program fees are € 4,250 per year.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     A limited number of partial fee waivers may be available for individual intakes,
                     <b>
                      see point 2 in the section Available scholarships for details.
                     </b>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     The LCT program fees cover:
                    </p>
                    <ul class="other-ul-ol">
                     <li>
                      the registration fees of the local universities;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      administrative support at the host universities;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      standard insurance scheme;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      instruction and access to resources at the assigned universities;
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      selected travel or other expenses directly related to the study in the LCT program, if approved by the consortium.
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-1-caebd45">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-8417e7167e535f1d9ab4" aria-expanded="false" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-8417e7167e535f1d9ab4" href="#collapse-8417e7167e535f1d9ab4">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     Available scholarships
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-1-caebd45" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535f1d9ab4" id="Collapse-8417e7167e535f1d9ab4">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     <strong>
                      1. Erasmus Mundus Scholarships
                     </strong>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     Not available for the intake 2025.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <strong>
                      2. Consortium Scholarships
                     </strong>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     A limited number of tuition fee reductions are available for self-funded students admitted in 2025. Priority will be given to academically outstanding applicants with financial need.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     To apply, send a letter explaining your request and financial circumstances to lct-admin (at) lst.uni-saarland.de within one week of receiving your admission offer.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <strong>
                      3a. Erasmus+
                     </strong>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     LCT students without the Erasmus Mundus scholarship may be eligible to apply for Erasmus+ support for the second program year. These grants can carry a small monthly allowance. The application is done via the International Office of the first year university. Deadlines for the application vary depending on the partner university, but are usually sometime in spring. Be sure to begin the process in good time by contacting the International Office of your first-year university.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <strong>
                      3b. Erasmus+ Internships
                     </strong>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     If you are a current LCT student and have not previously had Erasmus funding, you may be eligible for support under the Erasmus+ internship program to do a short or medium term internship in another European country. Your contact point is the International Office at your current institution.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <strong>
                      4. Other possiblities
                     </strong>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     You can find other scholarships for studying in Europe here:
                     <a href="http://www.scholarshipportal.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                      http://www.scholarshipportal.com/
                     </a>
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-e01e255 elementor-widget elementor-widget-elementskit-accordion" data-element_type="widget" data-id="e01e255" data-widget_type="elementskit-accordion.default">
              <div class="elementor-widget-container">
               <div class="ekit-wid-con">
                <div class="elementskit-accordion accoedion-primary" id="accordion-67e535f1da9bb">
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-0-e01e255">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-d3b0a8e67e535f1da9bb" aria-expanded="false" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-d3b0a8e67e535f1da9bb" href="#collapse-d3b0a8e67e535f1da9bb">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     Other scholarship opportunities
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-0-e01e255" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535f1da9bb" id="Collapse-d3b0a8e67e535f1da9bb">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     This list is under construction and is not complete.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     Students from the following countries may wish to pursue these scholarship opportunities in their own country:
                    </p>
                    <ul class="other-ul-ol">
                     <li>
                      If you are a U.S. citizen:
                      <br/>
                      <a href="http://us.fulbrightonline.org/">
                       Fulbright U.S. Student Program
                      </a>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      If you are a German citizen:
                      <br/>
                      <a href="https://www.daad.de/ausland/studieren/stipendium/de/70-stipendien-finden-und-bewerben/?detailid=3501&fachrichtung=10&land=30&status=2&seite=1">
                       German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD)
                      </a>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      If you are a citizen of the Netherlands, the German Institute of Amsterdam offers scholarships for study or research stays in Germany (3-10 months):
                      <br/>
                      <a href="https://lct-master.org/contents_2014/financial-info.php">
                       dia-stipendium@uva.nl
                      </a>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p>
                     <strong>
                      5. European Loan Program for EU Residents:
                     </strong>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     ERASMUS+ MASTER LOANS
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     Self-financing residents of a program country may be eligible to apply for an EU-sponsored loan scheme, offered at favorable conditions. The loans are up to € 12,000  for a one-year Master's program and up to € 18,000  for an up to two-year Master's program and can cover both living and tuition costs in any of the 33 Erasmus+ Programme Countries.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     Eligibility criteria
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     To be eligible students must:
                    </p>
                    <ul class="other-ul-ol">
                     <li>
                      Be a resident of one of the Erasmus+ Programme Countries.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Have successfully completed first-cycle higher education studies (Bachelor's degree or equivalent) and have been accepted for a second- cycle program (Master's degree or equivalent) at a recognized higher education institution (HEI) which holds the Erasmus Charter for Higher Education (ECHE).
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p>
                     The Master's (or equivalent) that they intend to study must:
                    </p>
                    <ul class="other-ul-ol">
                     <li>
                      be delivered in a different country from their country of residence and from where they obtained their Bachelor's degree (or the equivalent degree which is giving them access to the Master's program)
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      be a full program that will lead to a degree.
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p>
                     More information on the scheme and the participating financial institutions is available on this
                     <a href="https://www.masterstudies.com/articles/what-is-an-erasmus-master-loan-scheme">
                      website
                     </a>
                     .
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <!-- .elementskit-card END -->
                 <div class="elementskit-card">
                  <div class="elementskit-card-header" id="primaryHeading-1-e01e255">
                   <a aria-controls="Collapse-10a155367e535f1da9bb" aria-expanded="false" class="ekit-accordion--toggler elementskit-btn-link collapsed" data-ekit-toggle="collapse" data-target="#Collapse-10a155367e535f1da9bb" href="#collapse-10a155367e535f1da9bb">
                    <div class="ekit_accordion_icon_left_group">
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_normal_icon">
                      <!-- Normal Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-down icon-open icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                     <div class="ekit_accordion_active_icon">
                      <!-- Active Icon -->
                      <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-up icon-closed icon-left">
                      </i>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="ekit-accordion-title">
                     Insurance scheme
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="primaryHeading-1-e01e255" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion-67e535f1da9bb" id="Collapse-10a155367e535f1da9bb">
                   <div class="elementskit-card-body ekit-accordion--content">
                    <p>
                     All LCT students are insured by the company Dr. Walter. You can find more information about the insurance under this
                     <a href="https://www.erasmus-plus-insurance.com/">
                      link
                     </a>
                     .
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     The company Dr. Walter has published the following FAQ

  <script id="jquery-js-after" type="text/javascript">
   (function () {
            function setHeaderTopSpacing() {

                setTimeout(function() {
                  var headerTop = document.querySelector('.header-top');
                  var headers = document.querySelectorAll('.header-wrapper .header,.header-wrapper .header-homepage');

                  for (var i = 0; i < headers.length; i++) {
                      var item = headers[i];
                      item.style.paddingTop = headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px";
                  }

                    var languageSwitcher = document.querySelector('.mesmerize-language-switcher');

                    if(languageSwitcher){
                        languageSwitcher.style.top = "calc( " +  headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px + 1rem)" ;
                    }
                    
                }, 100);

             
            }

            window.addEventListener('resize', setHeaderTopSpacing);
            window.mesmerizeSetHeaderTopSpacing = setHeaderTopSpacing
            mesmerizeDomReady(setHeaderTopSpacing);
        })();
  </script>

              <div class="elementor-widget-container">
               <p>
                The documents published here are samples only and will be updated for each course edition of students.
               </p>
               <ul>
                <li>
                 <span style="color: #3366ff;">
                  <a href="https://lct-master.org/registration/documents/LCT_EM_Contract_Blank.pdf" rel="noopener" style="color: #3366ff;" target="_blank">
                   Erasmus Mundus Scholarship Holders Contract
                  </a>
                 </span>
                </li>
               </ul>
               <p>
                This is a
                <b>
                 partial
                </b>
                indication of mandatory activities for students, copied from the sample contract available here. It is for convenience only and is not necessarily a full listing. For more complete details, carefully read the sample contract:
               </p>
               <p>
                The following are considered core LCT Program activities, in which the student participates:
               </p>
               <p>
                1. the Summer School before commencing year 1
                <br/>
                2. the courses included in the student’s study plan, annexed to this contract
                <br/>
                3. the evaluation and assessment exercises and exams
                <br/>
                4. the Summer School before commencing year 2
                <br/>
                5. the Master´s thesis on a topic approved by both hosting institutions
                <br/>
                6. the Annual Meeting of the LCT program participants
                <br/>
                7. the mandatory internship
               </p>

  <script id="jquery-js-after" type="text/javascript">
   (function () {
            function setHeaderTopSpacing() {

                setTimeout(function() {
                  var headerTop = document.querySelector('.header-top');
                  var headers = document.querySelectorAll('.header-wrapper .header,.header-wrapper .header-homepage');

                  for (var i = 0; i < headers.length; i++) {
                      var item = headers[i];
                      item.style.paddingTop = headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px";
                  }

                    var languageSwitcher = document.querySelector('.mesmerize-language-switcher');

                    if(languageSwitcher){
                        languageSwitcher.style.top = "calc( " +  headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px + 1rem)" ;
                    }
                    
                }, 100);

             
            }

            window.addEventListener('resize', setHeaderTopSpacing);
            window.mesmerizeSetHeaderTopSpacing = setHeaderTopSpacing
            mesmerizeDomReady(setHeaderTopSpacing);
        })();
  </script>

                    <div class="ekit-team-modal-info has-img">
                     <h2 class="ekit-team-modal-title">
                      Association for Computational Linguistics
                     </h2>
                     <p class="ekit-team-modal-position">
                      The European Chapter of the ACL (EACL) is the primary professional association for computational linguistics in Europe. It provides a number of services to its members and the community.
                     </p>
                     <div class="ekit-team-modal-content">
                      <b>
                       <a href="https://www.uni-saarland.de/en/department/lst.html" target="_blank">
                        Department of Language Science and Technology
                       </a>
                      </b>
                      <br/>
                      <br/>
                      <b>
                       <a href="http://www.uni-saarland.de/" target="_blank">
                        Saarland University in Saarbrücken
                       </a>
                      </b>
                      <br/>
                      <br/>
                      <b>
                       <a href="https://www.uni-saarland.de/en/faculty-p/pruefsek-coli.html" target="_blank">
                        Information for MSc thesis registration and submission at Saarland University.
                       </a>
                      </b>
                      <br/>
                      <br/>
                      At Saarland University (USAAR), the EM-LCT programme is run by the Department of Language Science and Technology (LST) and is integrated in the local MSc. programme of the same name: https://www.uni-saarland.de/en/department/lst/studies.html. The chairs of the department cover a wide range of linguistics and language technologies: computational linguistics, psycholinguistics, phonetics, digital signal processing, general linguistics, translation studies, machine translation. There is a strong link to the Department of Multilinguality and Language Technology at the German Research Center for Artificial Intelligence (DFKI) (http://www.dfki.de). The current research flagship is the Collaborative Research Centre (SFB) on "Information Density and Linguistic Encoding" (http://www.sfb1102.uni-saarland.de) that consists of several research projects with international significance.
                     </div>

  <script id="jquery-js-after" type="text/javascript">
   (function () {
            function setHeaderTopSpacing() {

                setTimeout(function() {
                  var headerTop = document.querySelector('.header-top');
                  var headers = document.querySelectorAll('.header-wrapper .header,.header-wrapper .header-homepage');

                  for (var i = 0; i < headers.length; i++) {
                      var item = headers[i];
                      item.style.paddingTop = headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px";
                  }

                    var languageSwitcher = document.querySelector('.mesmerize-language-switcher');

                    if(languageSwitcher){
                        languageSwitcher.style.top = "calc( " +  headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px + 1rem)" ;
                    }
                    
                }, 100);

             
            }

            window.addEventListener('resize', setHeaderTopSpacing);
            window.mesmerizeSetHeaderTopSpacing = setHeaderTopSpacing
            mesmerizeDomReady(setHeaderTopSpacing);
        })();
  </script>

  <script id="jquery-js-after" type="text/javascript">
   (function () {
            function setHeaderTopSpacing() {

                setTimeout(function() {
                  var headerTop = document.querySelector('.header-top');
                  var headers = document.querySelectorAll('.header-wrapper .header,.header-wrapper .header-homepage');

                  for (var i = 0; i < headers.length; i++) {
                      var item = headers[i];
                      item.style.paddingTop = headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px";
                  }

                    var languageSwitcher = document.querySelector('.mesmerize-language-switcher');

                    if(languageSwitcher){
                        languageSwitcher.style.top = "calc( " +  headerTop.getBoundingClientRect().height + "px + 1rem)" ;
                    }
                    
                }, 100);

             
            }

            window.addEventListener('resize', setHeaderTopSpacing);
            window.mesmerizeSetHeaderTopSpacing = setHeaderTopSpacing
            mesmerizeDomReady(setHeaderTopSpacing);
        })();
  </script>

           <p>

           </p>
           <p>

         <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-73a27ee elementor-widget elementor-widget-elementskit-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="73a27ee" data-widget_type="elementskit-heading.default">
          <div class="elementor-widget-container">
           <div class="ekit-wid-con">
            <div class="ekit-heading elementskit-section-title-wraper text_left ekit_heading_tablet- ekit_heading_mobile-">
             <h2 class="ekit-heading--title elementskit-section-title">
              Anonymous and protected usage
             </h2>
             <div class="ekit_heading_separetor_wraper ekit_heading_elementskit-border-divider">
              <div class="elementskit-border-divider">
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
